recipes.title: Law's Sword (Kikoku)
lines: The §lKikoku§r is a large two-handed sword. Its cutting capability and range exceed that of a katana, due to its weight and size. Right clicking a player with this sword while being an Ope Ope no Mi Devil fruit user and being in a dome will extract the Player's heart.

recipes.title: Cutlass
lines: A §lCutlass§r is a short, thick saber, with a slightly curved blade sharpened on the cutting edge, and a hilt often featuring a solid cupped or basket-shaped guard. It is used by many low-ranked marines.
